title: Kiddie Pool of Youth | SCP-006 | Rookies – Episode 2
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

While on his coffee break, a clone recruit discovers the perils of the so-called Fountain of Youth.

This is the second episode of the animated series Rookies, featuring [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-006 SCP-006].
